about_the_game:
This is the Super Soul Bros’ Fraymakers Original Soundtrack, featuring jazz covers of indie game music and the Fraymakers Main Theme, an original composition. Super Soul Bros are a live jazz band based out of San Jose, CA that you might recognize from events like TwitchCon, MAGFest, PAX West, Super Smash Con and many more. Every Super Soul Bros track created during Fraymakers Early Access will be added to this soundtrack as they’re released.

Note: This soundtrack contains only tracks written by Super Soul Bros - other artists will have their own soundtracks sold as separate DLC in the future.
detailed_description:
This is the Super Soul Bros’ Fraymakers Original Soundtrack, featuring jazz covers of indie game music and the Fraymakers Main Theme, an original composition. Super Soul Bros are a live jazz band based out of San Jose, CA that you might recognize from events like TwitchCon, MAGFest, PAX West, Super Smash Con and many more. Every Super Soul Bros track created during Fraymakers Early Access will be added to this soundtrack as they’re released.

Note: This soundtrack contains only tracks written by Super Soul Bros - other artists will have their own soundtracks sold as separate DLC in the future.
